org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.http

Class RegionVisualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.AbstractHBaseTool
      • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.master.http.RegionVisualizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.hadoop.conf.Configurable, org.apache.hadoop.util.Tool

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class RegionVisualizer
extends AbstractHBaseTool
    Support class for the "Region Visualizer" rendered out of src/main/jamon/org/apache/hadoop/hbase/tmpl/master/RegionVisualizerTmpl.jamon
